website_summaries.verdict: The perfect set of highball glasses for the whole family to enjoy.
pros: Highball glasses come in a large set of 10, perfect for families
Fun bubble design is appealing to kids and adults
The bubbles face inward, so the outside of the glass is smooth and comfortable to hold
Glasses stack on top of each other for storage
cons: Glasses are lighter than they look

customer_reviews.title: Fragile
customer_reviews.text: Look nice,...but not as thick as others I have had for years. UPDATE May 2019 - to date 3 glasses have cracked or chipped and it seems in every case, heat was the common element. I've reduced my star rating as a result. Drinking glasses should have a minimum heat resistance and to have so many break in 3 months is bad
customer_reviews.author: Len

customer_reviews.title: Slippery when wet (condensation)
customer_reviews.text: The pattern of bubbles is on the inside. Should be on the ouside for gripping purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Shery

customer_reviews.title: Basic and beautiful table glasses.
customer_reviews.text: An excellent basic set of water glasses, which are functional and beautiful. They sparkle slightly when filled with a beverage and ice, making a nice addition to any table. They have light decorative round bubble like indentations, which is simple enough to use with almost any place setting. The glasses are heavy enough to maintain stability, and would not tend to turn over due to the shape. They are dishwasher safe, and look somewhat dainty, but have a good weight. I would recommend these water/tea glasses for almost any table decore due to their durability and beauty.
customer_reviews.author: E. Dennis

customer_reviews.title: pretty, durable, & definitely great value
customer_reviews.text: These are great. They are heavy duty & also really beautiful. They have enough unique design without being over the top, so it's like classic with a little flair. Had them for months & I'm a clumsy person, yet absolutely no breaks, chips or any issues. They are our everyday glasses, but I use the short ones for mixed drinks & they look fitting for that purpose too. We actually even use them for coffee sometimes too, so they are like the everything cups!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, no surprises, they are as they appear in the photos.
customer_reviews.text: I just got these for every day use. They shipped quickly and are "as advertised". They are sturdy and look nice. I also appreciate a flat bottom, so as to not hold water in the dishwasher. Time will tell as to how they hold up...
customer_reviews.author: AKS

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but broken
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty glasses. They have a good weight to them and seem sturdy enough. The one star is off because I only have 15 of the 16 glasses. One was broken when I opened the box. They may want to rethink the packaging and put more than a paper-thin piece of cardboard separating each glass.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: Bought these glasses to replace thinner daily drinking glasses that kept breaking in the dishwasher. These things are thick and heavy. Easy to grip in the hand and so far have not cracked or broken. The design is pretty cool too.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Heavy Glasses
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded all of my expectations. Heavy glasses with a nice a nice circular motif. Like them so much I ordered 8 juice glasses to go with the set. Highly recommended-you too will be pleased.
customer_reviews.author: BMK22

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy yet pretty glassware perfect for everyday use. Pretty enough for casual entertaining. Very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Donna C L

customer_reviews.title: Nice glasses
customer_reviews.text: Pretty glasses, good thickness but not as thick or as heavy at a pint class. Durable so far and holds up in the dishwasher without chipping.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Jama

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: really liked that it is so sturdy, and made out of glass. who wants to store their beverage in plastic? its kind of old fashioned and that's what i wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy H.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived partially broken
customer_reviews.text: Good glasses some came broken so now we don’t have a full set. Not sure if the seller will send replacements. The outside is smooth and the bubble design is inside.
customer_reviews.author: LarryC

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased, it matches perfectly with the ones I've previously ...
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased, it matches perfectly with the ones I've previously broken (that I purchased at a vintage shop). I didn't think I'd be able to replace them! I now have extras on hand in case another accident happens. :) The shipping was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, with a a good, heavy feel
customer_reviews.text: Great everyday drinking glass and nice enough for entertaining. Good size (17 oz) for iced tea, bloody marys, cola, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Ricks picks

customer_reviews.title: Great Glasses
customer_reviews.text: These are great, heavy and thick glasses with a nice designed. I need to get more...
customer_reviews.author: J. Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Look good
customer_reviews.text: I’d give these a perfect score except one of the glasses had a chip in the lid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Attractive
customer_reviews.text: These glasses were smaller than I had anticipated, but they are very nice. Sturdy, only will brake if you abuse them. You can use every day or for entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Hall

customer_reviews.title: Nice drinking glasses
customer_reviews.text: I really like these glasses. They are very sturdy for the price. The circle detail is a nice modern twist on a standard drinking glass.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for a big glass of lemonade
customer_reviews.text: Very good for everyday use. Nice a tall but sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Leas

customer_reviews.title: Retro
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are so cute. They definitely go with the Mid-Century modern decor. I think my grandmother may have had some like these.
customer_reviews.author: J Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty glasses
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with my purchase. The glasses are very pretty and of good quality. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Llamasaurus

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: Bought these water glasses after a lot of searching around for something that was sturdy, tall and attractive;) Found these water glasses which were just perfect. The bubble design is fun! Very happy I bought them!
customer_reviews.author: Ann B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect everyday use glasses
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality glasses. The dots are on the inside and add a nice style. Heavy but not too heavy. Perfect everyday use glasses.
customer_reviews.author: kwh

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but broken.  Bad customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful glasses! But inside the undamaged box I opened, were 4 broken glasses. Tried to return, but customer service was the run-around.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Warmack

customer_reviews.title: we are seniors and these glasses are easy to hold
customer_reviews.text: we are seniors and have some difficulty with grip .....................these glasses are easy to grip
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Ten in the set
customer_reviews.text: Amazing glasses! Put liquid through the opening in the top and it stays there until tilted so the fluid can spill over the top edge!
customer_reviews.author: MJoy

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: I received my 16 piece set today and 2 of the big glasses are broke. I’d love to get two more sent to me so I don’t have to send them all back
customer_reviews.author: honestjoejackson

customer_reviews.title: Cute & sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed after constantly breaking other glasses we had because the tops were too thin. These are perfect and seem pretty unbreakable!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather L. Fullerton

customer_reviews.title: Broken Glasses.
customer_reviews.text: 2 glasses were broke when received. I recommend buying locally being as it would have been more trouble to return them than it was to get replacements. Wouldn’t order again.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela English

customer_reviews.title: packaged very good. no chance of breaking unless run over
customer_reviews.text: very sturdy, if you do not like heavy glasses do not get these. these are easy to hang on to by the way they are tapered.
customer_reviews.author: T.K.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely design!
customer_reviews.text: The glasses met all my expectations. They are nicely designed and have a good feel. Classic look will go with any setting.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: Some glasses were broken but received replacement set quickly and second set was fine. I think they were mishandled during shipping. The glasses are attractive and nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value nice looking glasses
customer_reviews.text: A really nice every day uses glasses. Perfect size in both sizes. Very pretty and stylish , dishwasher safe. Very happy with a purchase, great value.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J. ONeil-Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these glasses for my daughter’s college apartment. They are exactly what we were looking for and the right amount of short and tall glasses. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Rieke

customer_reviews.title: Love my bubble glasses so far!
customer_reviews.text: I like the design, the fact that they are lightweight and that the quantities of each size was perfect. Most sets only have 4 of each size.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Mundt

customer_reviews.title: Hey Amazon, nice glass.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that this glass can hold its liquid all night, without having to get up to pee.
customer_reviews.author: TODD C COLLINGS

customer_reviews.title: I've been waiting to find some more of these glasses ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been waiting to find some more of these glasses since I got some over a year ago. Lovely weight and look.
customer_reviews.author: M. N. Mashinter

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses
customer_reviews.text: These are thick glasses are heavy and well balanced , perfect for everyday use. I would certainly purchase them again if I needed to.
customer_reviews.author: "maumaumau"

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but delivered with one broken
customer_reviews.text: The glassed are very nice, unfortunately one was broken on arrival so I got 9 out of 10 glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Stackable Bublé Glasses
customer_reviews.text: Packed well and like the feature that they are stackable.
customer_reviews.author: Nan777

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I had two of my glasses broken before I even took them out the box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Glasses!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful glasses that add a bit of elegance to everyday use. Perfect size for water, lemonade, beer or your favorite soft drink. I’m really happy with these and they are outstanding quality and value. Also came well packaged to prevent any damage.
customer_reviews.author: L. Vaclavik

customer_reviews.title: Good size, attractive and feel durable
customer_reviews.text: Bubble pattern is attractive. The glasses have a good feel to them. Have just received and washed them ( in the dishwasher top rack). Will update the review after return from first trip if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: linni

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality for price. Fun pattern.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product for price, a little lighter weight than expected but overall happy with purchase. Ran them all through dishwasher and so far so good. They have a fun pattern and look great on the dinner table.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Arrived at my home some of them broken. They are absolutely gorgeous. Thought were made of acrylic. Didn’t liked them at first, but now simpli loved them.
customer_reviews.author: karlav79

customer_reviews.title: Bubbly
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and came all in one piece:) I enjoy the size as well
customer_reviews.author: NedaaA

customer_reviews.title: Nice thick and heavy glassware.
customer_reviews.text: Bought some glassware from Macy and one was broken on arrival and another broke within a week of use. This glassware is not only attractive to look at but durable too. Heavy bottom for less tip overs.
customer_reviews.author: merlingirl

customer_reviews.title: Knockout Glasses!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are beautiful! They match some smaller glasses that I’ve had for years. They are perfectly weighted. Spend the money, they are definitely worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Sally Holzheimer

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive. Nice design. Very durable. They are heavier than they look, so it takes some getting used to. All in all very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Price

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I ordered these glasses. They are attractive, not heavy (but durable), and exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely and Durable
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They go with virtually anything, have a pleasing, modern design, and deliver on the promise of durability.
customer_reviews.author: CrimzonNKlover27

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and Functional
customer_reviews.text: Great looking, non-sweating, these glasses are the answer for no-ring beverage enjoyment. Perfect for water or the heaviest of smoothies with easy grip design, we love them!
customer_reviews.author: Miss K

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice, heavy bottom drinking glasses. Well worth the money. Very attractive. Quick and easy shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jo Thomas

customer_reviews.title: love, love
customer_reviews.text: love, love, love these glasses. Perfect size. Not too small and not overly large. Just the right size. The glass is prteey think too. Not the flimsy thin glass that breaks easily. I will be ording these again,
customer_reviews.author: Daylene Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Good looking at sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are good looking and very sturdy. Three teenage sons, and no glasses broken yet after three months. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Nice glasses
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my parents. They love them. Said heavier then they thought, which to me is a good thing
customer_reviews.author: Nash

product_meta.title: Attractive Bubble Design Highball Glasses Clear Heavy Base Tall Bar Glass Bubble Design - Set Of 10 Drinking Glasses for Water, Juice, Beer, Wine, and Cocktails, 17 ounce
feature_bullets: DESIGN: Our glasses make for a chic presentation of cocktails or any drink you serve on the rocks. Enjoy your beverage with full satisfaction These glasses are designed to fit snugly in your palm and most Importantly, do not contain any harmful chemicals such as BPA, phthalate, PVC or polycarbonate, so nothing can leach into your beverage from the glass. The fun and whimsical designs set a festive mood at any gathering

MATERIAL: Sculpted lines and lovely curved shape impart a polished sturdy & durable glass with comfortable grip. Their thin, cylindrical shape is easy to grasp, while their lightweight construction allows you to hold the glass cup for extended periods of time without ever making your hands or wrists feel tired. Each tall glass is shatter proof and will not stain or absorb odors. Perfect for hands of all sizes
USES: These can be used as drinking cups, tumblers, or can be filled with wine, whiskey, water, champagne, juice, iced tea.

CARE: It will not Warp or Crack in the Dishwasher, Stacks well with other pint glasses for easy storage. Superior resistance to use and dishwashing guarantees long lasting product. What’s more, each highball glass is extremely easy to clean! Just wash each cooler glass by hand with soap and water or safely place them in the dishwasher!

GIFT: For Special Celebrations to Everyday Use. Give them as a gift to your family and friends, bring them as a special housewarming gift or better yet, buy them for yourself and begin enjoying them in your home today! They are Lightweight and Comfortable to Hold Even by Kids. This unique set of glasses is bound to be an instant favorite! Treat yourself or make this glassware the perfect party favor! Great barware staple or the perfect complement to any dinnerware pattern or host gift.
